SELECT COUNT(UP.USED_PC_ID) FROM USED_PC UP , EDU_INFO EI , PC P WHERE UP.PC_ID = P.PC_ID AND UP.EDU_ID = EI.EDU_ID
AND (
P.PC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
EI.EDU_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
UP.MBR_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
P.IP LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
)
ORDER BY UP.USED_PC_ID DESC

SELECT U.USED_PC_ID usedPcId , U.EDU_ID eduId , U.EDU_TTL educationTitle , U.PC_ID pcId , U.PC_NAME pcName , U.MBR_ID memberId , U.IP ip FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , USED_PC2.* FROM ( SELECT UP.USED_PC_ID , UP.EDU_ID , EI.EDU_TTL , UP.PC_ID , P.PC_NAME , UP.MBR_ID , P.IP FROM USED_PC UP , EDU_INFO EI , PC P WHERE UP.PC_ID = P.PC_ID AND UP.EDU_ID = EI.EDU_ID
AND (
P.PC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
EI.EDU_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
UP.MBR_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
P.IP LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
)
ORDER BY UP.USED_PC_ID DESC ) USED_PC2 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endIndex} ) U WHERE RNUM >= #{startIndex}
